extendedInfo.description: TREAT FIRST WHAT KILLS FIRSTWhat you can do until the ambulance arrives.This application helps you  with first aid. Based on: Treat first what kills first.Works with the ABCD protocol.This application is also useful as a reference. Or for training / exercises.First Aid, SOS, ABCD protocol, ABCD methode, CPR, ABC methode, ABC protocol, Airway, Breathing, Circulation, Disability, Exposure.Please note that this application is a tool, a protocol. Based on medical knowledge and experience. Each situation is different... The author can not be held responsible for incorrect use of this application.The author assumes no legal responsibility for use of this application. Always use your common sense. Use the information as a tool.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: With this app even a kid can do the first aid in the right order. Strait to the point, No nonsens, traid first what kills first.
reviews.author: Al Ak

reviews.comment: Excellent App! We are impressed by the straight forward guidance.
reviews.author: wietse van tilburg
